Name: Exsys
About the game: What if you awake in a place that you are just something that nobody wants and wants to get rid of you? The only thing is to survive and get out of that place. Exsys is a Metroidvania, rouge-like, classic beat em' up game set in a futuristic city called The System. The game lets you play the role of an awakens piece of garbage who tries to survive from the deluded society that believes they are in order, organized, and secure called The System. The game lets you explore the world of The System, a very organized city and stable form of society where everybody assigned the role and will be eliminated if they do not do what they told to do. You have to escape by finding exits that are scattered around the city. The game-ending depended on the exit you find. The game world is an open-world Metroidvania style world that allows you to explore the world in a non-linear way. Explore a vast interconnected world of the System and find the way to get out of it. Rich and immersive game environment design. Find an exit that scatters around the world. In combat, with the flexible combo system that allows you to create your own combo without having to press a button in sequence to perform a specific combo. You can fight enemies in your personal style, or you can just smash any button if you want to. And gain a new combat move by stealing the enemy's body part and replace your body part or use it as a weapon. (WIP) Flexible combo system, mix & match moves to create your own combo. Air combo Counterattack Use Item to manipulate your stat to help you in the intense fight. Change body parts to gain new moves and abilities Use items to manipulate your stat to help you in a fight like in RPG. You can stack item effects on top of each other to create a multiplying effect of that item. Use in combination like increase strength and echo attack together to deal with enemies quickly. The choice is up to you.
